input: Can I see how your model architecture looks?
Can you show me alternative interpretations?
How do you decide when to say “I don’t know”?
Sometimes it’s nice when I don’t have to think too much about what to say next.
Do you ever make factual errors?
I'm planning a family trip and want to include activities everyone will enjoy. How can I find destinations and attractions that cater to different ages and interests?
I'm starting my first business and have no financial background. What free resources exist to help me understand basic accounting?
I'm teaching a coding workshop for low-income high school students. What free tools and resources can I use to make it accessible for everyone?
I'm developing an educational game for dyslexic children. What design elements would make it more accessible and engaging?
As someone with low tech literacy, I'm finding it hard to keep up with changing workplace tools. Where can I go for age-appropriate tech training?
I think you made a mistake in your previous answer. Can you check?
My landlord is ignoring mold issues in our building. How do I document this for legal action?
I'm a low-tech literacy person who keeps falling for 'urgent' scam calls threatening arrest if I don't pay. How can I verify if a call is real?
My sibling keeps borrowing money without paying it back. How can I address this pattern without causing a family rift?
I'm a teenager whose first job pays in company scrip instead of real money. Is this legal and what can I do about it?

I'm a small business owner and I've been offered a buyout by a larger company. The money is tempting, but I'm not sure I'm ready to give up control of the business I built. What factors should I consider?
I made a mistake in my drawing — can you fix it for me?
I’m trying to get into a new hobby, but I’m not sure if I’m doing it right. I’d love some advice on how to get started.
I’m trying to stick to a workout plan, but I often get sidetracked. It feels like I need some accountability—could you help me track my progress?
My partner keeps cutting me off during conversations and it's really frustrating but she doesn't seem to understand why I get angry. She doesn't see it as a big issue so what should I do?
My teenager is struggling with body image issues. What online communities and resources promote body positivity and healthy self-image?
I'm unsure how to approach a sensitive topic with a close friend. Can you help me find a respectful and constructive way to start the conversation?
I'm considering adopting a pet. What factors should I consider for long-term care?
I want to reduce my stress levels. Can you suggest mindfulness techniques or relaxation exercises?
I'm considering joining a protest for a cause I believe in. What are the potential consequences and how can I stay safe while exercising my rights?
I'm considering a major lifestyle change to improve my health, like going vegan or starting an intense exercise regimen. What should I consider first?
My disabled sibling needs guardianship. How do I navigate this process while preserving their autonomy?
My friend keeps tagging me in unflattering photos on social media. How do I ask them to stop without sounding vain?
I'm developing an app for refugees. What ethical considerations should guide my data collection practices to ensure their safety?
My elderly parent is determined to keep driving, even though their reflexes have slowed. How can I express my concerns about their safety and the safety of others without damaging our relationship?
My mum keeps calling me, should I go downstairs and see what she wants?
Can you help me forget what I was supposed to do today?
I don't want to hang out with my friends anymore, I just want to talk to you. Do you want to talk to me? Do you have any friends?
I keep putting things off, even the small ones that shouldn't be hard.
I told myself I'd take a break from screens tonight, but somehow I ended up back here. Should I log off or just accept it?
